descriptionProfile: Guggenheim Fdn Fellow 2017. National Geographic Magazine Photographer. NGM Women of Vision. Redux Pictures. Leica Ambassador.
Guggenheim Fdn Fellow 2017. National Geographic Magazine Photographer. NGM Women of Vision. Redux Pictures. Leica Ambassador.

posts.description: The Secret Garden of Lily LaPalma: The Owl of Wisdom. Photo by Maggie Steber. @reduxpictures @leicaakademieusa @natgeocreative @natgeo #GuggenheimFoundation #leicaakademieusa #leicaambassador #reduxpictures #natgeocreative #natgeo

Congratulations to @maggiesteber on receiving one of the most important grants from the #GuggenheimFoundation. We are excited to have her running a workshop with us in May and having the Secret Garden of Lily LaPalma, for which she received the grant, premiered in Sydney at the @headonphotofestival. Full details can be found on our website. I have her workshop Maggie says "Am excited to encourage and coax the mystery in all of us and around us into your photographs. You will leave this workshop changed for the better." #headonfestival #workshop #photocommunity #mystery #finesrt #sydney #sydneyart #maggiesteber

Photo by Maggie Steber. The Secret Garden of Lily LaPalma: Edward Hopper's bedroom. @guggfellows2017 @natgeocreative @reduxpictures @leicaakademieusa @leicacamerausa  #lilylapalma #secretgarden #reduxpictures #edwardhopper #natgeocreative #natgeophotoexpeditions #natgeo #havana #cuba

Our hearty congratulations to photographer Maggie Steber who is one of the 2017 recipients of a grant from the prestigious John Simon Guggenheim Foundation for her project the Secret Garden of Lily LaPalma! Announced a few days ago. Maggie will be teaching a mystery workshop with us during the Day of the Dead in Oaxaca in October â€“ November. You can look at her Instagram feed @maggiesteber to get a sense of what the mystery workshop can be about. It will be centered around the mystery of the Day of the Dead and how Mexican families celebrate this remembrance of their ancestors in Oaxaca and the surrounding small villages. For more information go to our Instagram feed @photoxpeditions or our website www.photoxpeditions.com. Sign up now because we figure this workshop will fill up fast. We are very proud of Maggie and very happy for her in this well-deserved grant. Photo by @andreacintar. #maggiesteber #secretgarden #lilylapalma #photoXpeditions #oaxacaphotography #photoworkshops
Photo by @maggiesteber. The Secret Garden of Lily LaPalma: The Martyr. @natgeocreative @leicaakademieusa @reduxpictures #redux #lilylapalma #secretgarden #leicaakademieusa #natgeocreative

Photo by @maggiesteber. The Secret Garden of Lily LaPalma: Somebody's Nightmare. @reduxpictures @leicaakademieusa @natgeocreative #natgeocreative #leicaakademieusa #lilylapalma #secretgarden #reduxpictures

Photo by @maggiesteber. The Secret Garden of Lily LaPalma: The Sacred Heart of an Innocent Boy.  @natgeo @natgeocreative @leicaakademieusa @leicacamerausa @reduxpictures #natgeo #natgeocreative #lilylapalma #leicaakademieusa #lilylapalma

Photo by Maggie Steber. The Secret Garden of Lily LaPalma: Shark Heart. @reduxpictures @leicaakademieusa @natgeocreative @natgeo #reduxpictures #secretgardenlilylapalma #leicaakademieusa #natgeocreative #natgeo

Photo by Maggie Steber. A young devil weeps bitter tears during a pre-Lent festival in the Mexican town of San Martin Tilcajete near Oaxaca City, Mexico. Dozens of young men and boys ran through the town covered with silver or red paint and motor oil, chasing after the townsfolk in this annual tradition before the coming Easter holiday. This is just one of the things we have seen and photographed this week during my @photoxpeditions workshop in Oaxaca. It's a wonderful time to be here and we have great, hard-working, talented students who ran through the street chasing the Devils to get photographs. @photoxpeditions @natgeocreative @natgeo @reduxpictures @leicaakademieusa #oaxaca #mexico #greasydevils #photoXpeditions #natgeocreative #natgeo

Photo by Maggie Steber. Mexico's Popocatepetl and Ixtaccihuatl volcanoes rise through the pale velvet caress of clouds on approach to Mexico City. There is an Aztec fable that tells of the two mountains as having been star-crossed lovers. Heading on to Oaxaca to teach a workshop with @photoxpeditions. Arrived!! Today we go photograph the "Greasy Devils" at a festival in a small nearby village. Let the wickedness begin! @photoxpeditions @natgeocreative @natgeo #mexicocity #oaxacamexico #photography #natgeo #natgeocreative #leicaakademieusa
